EmailTemplate.name: February Emails 2019.Contrast-Security FINAL - 2-5-19
EmailTemplate.subject: February 14 & 20 Webinars: Cloud-Native Security
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join Contrast Security and Pivotal for a two-part webinar series on Cloud-Native Security.
Part one, Cloud-Native Security: Understanding the Why and How <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/16739/348098?utm_source=Contrast+Security]]>, takes place Thursday, February 14 at 10:00am PST. Featuring Jeff Williams of Contrast Security, and David Zendrzian from Pivotal, the first webinar in the series will explain how enterprises address cloud-native application security at speed and scale.
Part two, Cloud-Native Security: Processes and Tools for Real-World Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-20-cloud-native-security-processes-and-tools-for-real-world-transformation-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=contrast-security&utm_term=q119]]>, occurs Wednesday, February 20 at 10:00am PST. In this webinar Jeff and David will discuss application development code security in pre-production as well as runtime security at scale for cloud-native production applications.
Presenters: Jeff Williams, Co-founder and Chief Technology Officer of Contrast Security David M. Zendzian, Pivotal Global CTO
Register today! February 14: Cloud-Native Security: Understanding the Why and How <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/16739/348098?utm_source=Contrast+Security]]> February 20: Cloud-Native Security: Processes and Tools for Real-World Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-20-cloud-native-security-processes-and-tools-for-real-world-transformation-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=contrast-security&utm_term=q119]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
